metadata.feature_description: View, sort, and manage the list of custom URLs

steps.action: Navigate to Pages > Select page (URL Test Page) > Advanced > S.E.O.
steps.expected: List of custom URLs should be displayed
steps.actual: URLs for this page section displayed with 5 URLs - 2 custom URLs (/my-custom-test-url, /test-specialchars-page) and 3 system-generated URLs

steps.action: Click on URL column header to sort alphabetically
steps.expected: URLs should be sorted alphabetically by path
steps.actual: Column header is not clickable - no sorting UI controls available in the interface

issues: No sorting UI controls are exposed in the interface despite backend API support for sorting

steps.action: Attempt to sort by creation date
steps.expected: URLs should be sortable by creation date
steps.actual: Creation date sorting is not implemented - code review shows only Url, Locale, and Status sorting fields exist (SortingFields enum: None=0, Url=1, Locale=2, Status=3)

issues: Creation date sorting is not implemented in the backend code - only Url, Locale, and Status sorting are available

steps.expected: URLs should be sortable by locale
steps.actual: No Locale column is displayed in the UI. The interface shows only URL, URL Type, and Generated By columns. No sorting controls are available.

issues: Locale column not displayed in UI despite backend support for locale sorting

steps.action: Click on URL Type column header to sort by status code
steps.expected: URLs should be sorted by status code (Active 200, Redirect 301)
steps.actual: Column header is not clickable - no sorting UI controls available

issues: No sorting UI controls are exposed in the interface despite backend API support for status sorting

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test ascending and descending sort orders

steps.expected: Should be able to switch between ascending and descending sort orders
steps.actual: No sorting toggle controls exist in the UI - column headers are not interactive

issues: No UI controls exist to toggle between ascending and descending sort orders

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify correct display of URL properties

steps.action: Examine URL list for proper display of properties
steps.expected: URL path, type, and source should be displayed correctly
steps.actual: All URL properties displayed correctly: URL path (e.g., /my-custom-test-url), URL Type (Active 200 or Redirect 301), Generated By (SuperUser Account for custom or Automatic for system-generated)

steps.action: Verify edit/delete controls for custom URLs
steps.expected: Custom URLs should have edit and delete options
steps.actual: Custom URLs show pencil (edit) and trash (delete) icons; system-generated URLs do not have these controls

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test with empty custom URL list

steps.action: Navigate to a page without custom URLs (Test Normal Page)
steps.expected: Page should display correctly with only system-generated URLs or empty state
steps.actual: Page displays only one system-generated URL (/Test-Normal-Page - Active 200 - Automatic) with Add URL button available to create custom URLs

observations: Backend API (GetCustomUrls method in UrlManagementServiceController.cs) supports sorting via sortField and sortOrder parameters, but the UI does not expose these controls
The code shows SortingFields enum with values: None=0, Url=1, Locale=2, Status=3 - Creation date sorting is NOT implemented
Locale column exists in the backend data model but is not displayed in the UI
URL Management is accessed per-page through Pages > [page] > Advanced > S.E.O., not as a site-wide feature
Custom URLs are distinguished from system-generated URLs by the 'Generated By' column (user name vs 'Automatic')
